name: Jetpack Jock for the ZX Spectrum
name_original: Jetpack Jock for the ZX Spectrum
description:
Jock has been amazing transported to the not so far distant future, only to find out that the Earth has been dominated by evil alien beings. Help Jock navigate the extraterrestrial structures in order to collect the energy time crystals to get back home to his own time.

Easy & hard version available.

Controls: Q for Fly and O & P for Left and Right. Kempston & Sinclair Joystick.

For the ZX Spectrum 48k & 128k.

48k version music by Riggz Solo

128k version music by CEEROY & PROG MASTER/SINC MASTERS C.G.
